sentences.en: His normal style when confronted with an obstacle was to bulldoze it into submission.
sentences.cn: 在前进的道路上碰到障碍时,他通常的做法是铲平障碍,继续前进.

sentences.en: Last week, the department's road builders began to bulldoze a water meadow on Twyford Down.
sentences.cn: 上个星期，这个部门的筑路机开始将特怀福德丘陵地带的浸水草甸推平。

sentences.en: My parents tried to bulldoze me into going to college.
sentences.cn: 父母千方百计逼迫我去上大学。

sentences.en: She defeated developers who wanted to bulldoze her home to build a supermarket.
sentences.cn: 她打败了那些想推倒她家房屋兴建超市的开发商们。

sentences.en: The teacher comes, in every case , not to bulldoze the man.
sentences.cn: 这位教师来了之后决不会恐吓这个人.

sentences.en: They bulldoze him into signing the contract.
sentences.cn: 他们强行使他签署这个契约.

sentences.en: They failed to bulldoze the amendment through Congress.
sentences.cn: 他们未能强行使国会通过这个修正案.

sentences.en: Was she going to try to bulldoze him into submission?
sentences.cn: 该死的东西!她想把他压服 吗 ?

sentences.en: You must bulldoze your way into the English language.
sentences.cn: 你不要怕这怕那,大胆地学你的英语吧.

words.tran_cn: 强迫；恫吓；用推土机清除

trans.tran_cn: 强迫（某人做某事）(-sb +into doing sth)，（用推土机）推倒，铲平，（使）强行通过
